Uses of Class
Model.Product

  • Packages that use Product 
    Package Description
    DataAccess  
    Model  

    • Uses of Product in DataAccess

      Methods in DataAccess that return Product 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Product ProductAccess.getProd(int prodID)
      This method takes as argument an integer which represents the product ID from the Product table and it returns an object of type Product
      Product ProductAccess.getProdID(java.lang.String name)
      This method takes as argument a String name which represents the name of the product from the Product table and it returns an object of type Product
      Methods in DataAccess that return types with arguments of type Product 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> ProductAccess.getProd()
      This method acceses the Products stored in the Product table and it returns them in an ArrayList of Products.
      java.util.TreeMap<Product,java.lang.Integer> WarehouseAccess.getProducts(int whID)
      This method takes a warehouse ID and it returns all the products and their quantities stored in that warehouse
      Methods in DataAccess with parameters of type Product 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WarehouseAccess.add(Product p, int quant, int whID)
      This method adds a product and its quantity into a warehouse
      void ProductAccess.add(Product p, int quant, int whID)
      This method adds a product in the Product table and based on it's index it stores the quantity of the Product in the specified warehouse
      void WarehouseAccess.delete(Product p)
      This method deletes a product from all warehouses
      void ProductAccess.delete(Product p)
      This method deletes an object of type Product from the Product table based on it's ID
      int WarehouseAccess.getQuantity(Product p)
      This method takes as argument an object of type Product and sums up all the quantities in all warehouses
      int[] WarehouseAccess.getQuantityWh(Product p)
      This method takes an object of type product and searches returns and array which holds the quantity of that product stored in each warehouse
      void ProductAccess.update(Product p)
      This method updates the price of the desired product which is given as an argument
      void WarehouseAccess.update(Product p, int quant, int whID)
      This method updates the quantity of a product from a specified warehouse
